Summary: Orange ball of light moves slowly toward the NW from SE
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were in Greentown watching the fireworks display on July 4th. The time was approx 9:45 PM. We were headed North on a road that we aren't sure what it was as we are not that familiar with Greentown. We noticed a large, low, orange light hanging stationary in the NE sky. (NE of Greentown) Then it began to move slowly from NW to SE in the sky. It was definately NOT a part of the fireworks. We continued to watch it until we couldn't see it anymore due to our driving and its moving away from us
trends: There have been no other sightings in Greentown
This sighting has never been favorited.
